info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:26PM EDT until July 13 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OTSEGO...EAST CENTRAL BROOME...WEST CENTRAL DELAWARE AND SOUTH CENTRAL CHENANGO COUNTIES... At 626 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sidney Center, or 11 miles northwest of Walton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Masonville, Unadilla, Afton, Sidney Center, Trout Creek, Oquaga Creek State Park, Youngs and Loomis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
